definition.name: Request Run for Oh Dear
definition.description: Trigger a new run for an Oh Dear site.
definition.author: Stefan Zweifel <stefan@stefanzweifel.dev>

inputs.name: oh_dear_token
inputs.description: Valid API token to communicate with the Oh Dear API.

inputs.name: check_id
inputs.description: The ID of the check that should run.

steps.run:
curl -X POST "https://ohdear.app/api/checks/${{ inputs.CHECK_ID }}/request-run" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer ${{ inputs.OH_DEAR_TOKEN }}" \
-H "Accept: application/json" \
-H "Content-Type: application/json"

evidence.reasoning: The action triggers a new run for an Oh Dear site, which involves communication with an external API and is related to monitoring the site's status.
